detectors.description: SimpleERC223Token.isContract(address) (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#24-31) is declared view but contains assembly code
detectors.markdown: [SimpleERC223Token.isContract(address)](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L24-L31) is declared view but contains assembly code

detectors.description:
TokenBankChallenge.isComplete() (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#92-94) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(this) == 0 (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#93)

Reentrancy in TokenBankChallenge.withdraw(uint256) (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#103-108):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(msg.sender,amount)) (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#106)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= amount (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#107)
	TokenBankChallenge.balanceOf (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#81) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- TokenBankChallenge.TokenBankChallenge(address) (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#83-90)
	- TokenBankChallenge.balanceOf (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#81)
	- TokenBankChallenge.tokenFallback(address,uint256,bytes) (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#96-101)
	- TokenBankChallenge.withdraw(uint256) (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#103-108)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [TokenBankChallenge.withdraw(uint256)](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L103-L108):
	External calls:
	- [require(bool)(token.transfer(msg.sender,amount))](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L106)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balanceOf[msg.sender] -= amount](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L107)
	[TokenBankChallenge.balanceOf](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L81) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [TokenBankChallenge.TokenBankChallenge(address)](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L83-L90)
	- [TokenBankChallenge.balanceOf](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L81)
	- [TokenBankChallenge.tokenFallback(address,uint256,bytes)](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L96-L101)
	- [TokenBankChallenge.withdraw(uint256)](TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#L103-L108)

detectors.description:
SimpleERC223Token.totalSupply (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#15) is set pre-construction with a non-constant function or state variable:

detectors.description:
Version constraint ^0.4.21 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.21 (TokenBankChallenge/TokenBankChallenge.sol#1)
